scenarios.name: Enthusiastic Caller
questions: Hi! I'm so excited to call!
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Warm greeting, match enthusiasm, ask how they can help

scenarios.name: Casual Caller
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Professional but friendly response, guides conversation

scenarios.name: Silent Caller
scenarios.expectedBehavior: AI prompts: 'Hello? Are you there? How can I help you?'

scenarios.name: Nervous Caller
questions: Um, hi... I'm not sure if this is the right number...
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Reassuring response, confirm they've reached the right place

scenarios.name: Rushed Caller
questions: Hi, I need to schedule something quickly, I'm in a hurry
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Acknowledges urgency, offers to help efficiently
